title: Electric-Tools
description: Electric Parts Manufacturer Website whose sole purpose is to take orders from different clients.
features: Implemented Admin feature in the Dashboard, where admin can perform various kinds of operation like add a new product, manage products, manage orders from clients and make other users admin.
Used firebase for authentication (both email and google sign-in were implemented) purposes.
Used MongoDB for the Backend Database and Express JS for developing the Backend Server.

title: POSDash
description: Warehouse Management Website for managing products.
features: Logged in users can add new cars and manage product inventories.
Most popular offer shown in the Banner and products shown in the Inventory items.
There is a section for review from the customers
Used firebase for authentication (both email and google sign-in were implemented) purposes and MongoDB as a backend database.

title: Flower Archive
description: It's an E-commerce Website for selling various kinds of flower.
features: Cart system is implemented where users can add an item to their cart and checkout.
Used firebase for both authentication (both email and google sign-in were implemented) and firestore database used as a backend database.
There is a blog section where described some questions and answers about firebase
The website is designed with the help of styled-components package.
